assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: LB is a member of the Illumina Medical Ethics Board, receives honoraria from Wolters-Kluwer, and receives research support from Merck. FPR is an advisor and/or shareholder for SeqWell, Ranomics, Biosymetrics, and Constantiam Biosciences, and has received research support from Biogen, Beam Therapeutics, Deep Genomics, and Alnylam.
